accept.desc: Comma separated list of unique file type specifiers. Maps to 'accept' attribute of native input type=file element

max-file-size.desc: Maximum size of individual file in bytes

max-total-size.desc: Maximum size of all files combined in bytes

filter.desc: Custom filter for added files; Only files that pass this filter will be added to the queue and uploaded

files.desc: Candidate files to be added to queue

returns.desc: Filtered files to be added to queue

no-thumbnails.desc: Don't display thumbnails for image files

url.desc: URL or path to the server which handles the upload. Takes String or factory function, which returns String. Function is called right before upload

method.desc: HTTP method to use for upload; Takes String or factory function which returns a String; Function is called right before upload

headers.desc: Array or a factory function which returns an array; Array consists of objects with header definitions; Function is called right before upload

batch.desc: Upload files in batch (in one XHR request); Takes boolean or factory function for Boolean; Function is called right before upload

header.desc: Slot for custom header; Scope is the QUploader instance itself

list.desc: Slot for custom list; Scope is the QUploader instance itself

add.desc: Emitted when files are added into the list

files.desc: Array of files that were added

uploaded.desc: Emitted when file or batch of files is uploaded

xhr.desc: XMLHttpRequest that has been used to upload this batch of files

failed.desc: Emitted when file or batch of files has encountered error while uploading

xhr.desc: XMLHttpRequest that has been used to upload this batch of files

uploading.desc: Emitted when file or batch of files started uploading

abort.desc: Abort upload of all files (same as clicking the abort button)

upload.desc: Start uploading (same as clicking the upload button)

pickFiles.desc: Trigger file pick (same as clicking the plus button); Must be called as a direct consequence of user interaction (eg. in a click handler), due to browsers security policy

reset.desc: Resets uploader to default; Empties queue, aborts current uploads

removeUploadedFiles.desc: Removes already uploaded files from the list

removeQueuedFiles.desc: Remove files that are waiting for upload to start (same as clicking the left clear button)

removeFile.desc: Remove specified file from the queue
